featured.text: Regarding the first example, which of the following is FALSE? (A) Nelson was not a responsible person. (B) Adam and Nelson are military officers.
The Swiss military purchasers considered the new model with a corkscrew for opening wine not “essential for survival,” so officers had to buy this new model by themselves.
And as they could buy the Swiss army knife at shops on military bases, they bought huge quantities of them.
In some countries, military service is ______ for men only; women do not have to serve in the military.

definition.zh_def: 軍事的；與軍隊或戰爭有關的。
definition.en_def: Relating to the armed forces or warfare.
definition.example: He decided to pursue a career in the military.
